spell.name: Aqua Edge
spell.desc: Slice the enemy with the force of water.

spell.name: Wind Blade
spell.desc: Shear the enemy with a blast of wind.

spell.name: Fireball
spell.desc: Shoot multiple fireballs at the enemy.

spell.name: Ice Needles
spell.desc: Strike the enemy with needles of ice.

spell.name: Lightning
spell.desc: Shower the enemy with lightning.

spell.name: Grave
spell.desc: Spear-shaped rocks are thrust up from below.

spell.name: Spread
spell.desc: The enemy is shredded by whirling water.

spell.name: Acid Rain
spell.desc: The acid reduces the enemy's resistance.

spell.name: Heal
spell.desc: Restores HP of an ally.

spell.name: Nurse
spell.desc: Restores all allies HP.

spell.name: Cure
spell.desc: Restores HP of an ally.

spell.name: Restore
spell.desc: Restore HP of allies within the area.

spell.name: Resurrection
spell.desc: Revives a dead ally.

spell.name: Air Thrust
spell.desc: Shear the enemy with a blast of wind.

spell.name: Cyclone
spell.desc: Engulf the enemy in a twister.

spell.name: Concentrate
spell.desc: Increases Accuracy of an ally.

spell.name: Item Plus
spell.desc: Power up. Additional bonus is awarded after a Technical Smash.

spell.name: Medical Plus
spell.desc: Power up. Additional +5% HP restored when Craymel Arte is used during battle.

spell.name: Eruption
spell.desc: Surround the enemy in scalding magma.

spell.name: Flame Wall
spell.desc: Set a flame trap in front of the enemy.

spell.name: Explode
spell.desc: Swallow the enemy in a massive explosion.

spell.name: Sharpness
spell.desc: Increases Attack of an ally.

spell.name: Stalagmite
spell.desc: Massive boulders are jetted out from below.

spell.name: Ground Dasher
spell.desc: Destructive forces of earth are brought to life.

spell.name: Mental Charge
spell.desc: Power up. Restore +1% of all ally TP at the end of battle.

spell.name: Life Rescue
spell.desc: Power up. HP is automatically restored as it decreases.

spell.name: Mental Supply
spell.desc: Power up. TP is restored according to the amount of damage received.

spell.name: Freeze Lancer
spell.desc: The enemy is showered with spears of ice.

spell.name: Blizzard
spell.desc: Raises forth a fierce snow storm.

spell.name: Absolute
spell.desc: Freeze the enemy with an ultra cold blast.

spell.name: Resist
spell.desc: Increases Defense of an ally.

spell.name: Freeze Guard
spell.desc: Power up. Protects against Freeze.

spell.name: Thunder Blade
spell.desc: Tear apart the enemy with blades of lightning.

spell.name: Indignation
spell.desc: The enemy is englufed in a lightning storm.

spell.name: Recover
spell.desc: Cure abnormal status of an ally.

spell.name: Charge
spell.desc: Share your TP with an ally. Defeating the enemy restores TP.

spell.name: Stun Guard
spell.desc: Power up. Protects against Stun.

spell.name: Dark Force
spell.desc: Wrap the enemy in a barrier of darkness.

spell.name: Bloody Howl
spell.desc: The enemy is shredded by a screaming curse.

spell.name: Deep Mist
spell.desc: Shroud the enemy in mist that reduces the enemy attack accuracy.

spell.name: Barrier
spell.desc: Increase Defense of an ally.

spell.name: Ray
spell.desc: The enemy is showered with numerous heat rays.

spell.name: Holy Lance
spell.desc: The enemy is showered with numerous heat rays.

spell.name: Holy Bliss
spell.desc: Gradually regenerates HP and heals the last damage received.

spell.name: Health
spell.desc: Power up. Defeating an enemy restores some HP.

spell.name: Meteor Swarm
spell.desc: Call forth meteors to strike the enemy.

spell.name: Shooting Star
spell.desc: Call forth shooting stars to strike the enemy.

spell.name: Poison Guard
spell.desc: Power up. Protects against Poison.

spell.name: Life Up
spell.desc: Power up. +2 bonus HP at level up.

spell.name: Distortion
spell.desc: Time is distorted to erase enemy existance.

spell.name: Stagnation
spell.desc: The enemy's recovery time is delayed.

spell.name: Delay
spell.desc: The enemy's chant is delayed by distorting time.

spell.name: Drain Guard
spell.desc: Power up. Protects against Weak.

spell.name: Mental Up
spell.desc: Power up. Bonus +1 TP at level up.
